DOC.brief_summary: Drugs with anticholinergic potential increase the risk of postoperative transient and persistent cognitive dysfunction especially in cardiac patients. The investigators main goal is to identify preoperative risk factors and to monitor postoperative patients' state in relation to SAA activity and bilateral BIS-EEG changes.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Serum Anticholinergic Activity in ACVB Patients
